cogsofcarminite.ponder.hornblower.text_1: Hornblowers use kinetic energy to blow on horn items
cogsofcarminite.ponder.hornblower.text_2: They can be powered from below using shafts or cogwheels
cogsofcarminite.ponder.hornblower.text_3: Use Right-click while holding a horn to insert it
cogsofcarminite.ponder.hornblower.text_4: After a short delay, the Hornblower will sound the horn
cogsofcarminite.ponder.hornblower.text_5: Right-click with an empty hand to retrieve the horn
cogsofcarminite.ponder.hornblower.text_6: The Hornblower may also use the Crumble Horn
cogsofcarminite.ponder.hornblower.text_7: Each time the Crumble Horn is used, it's effect will be applied to random blocks in the 5x5x5 area in front of the Hornblower
cogsofcarminite.tooltip.hornblower.empty: Use a Horn Item to Insert
